validation.message: An application name can only contain characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9, -, and _

An application title must be provided

entry.value: {"controlHints":[{"text":"The application name is used to uniquely identify the application and is used in urls. \nBest to keep it short.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P1_C30_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Use versions to make complicated changes without affecting live users. ","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P1_C51_"},{"text":"The application title is shown to users.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P1_C34_","type":"hover"},{"text":"Use the description to enter any further information about the application.\nIt is not shown to users.","style":"","controlId":"rapid_P1_C35_","type":"hover"}]}
